sentences.en: ‘It was a dreadful experience.’ ‘Never mind, it’s all over (=  completely finished  ) now.’
sentences.cn: “真是一段可怕的经历。”“没关系，现在都过去了。”

sentences.en: [as adj.]an all-out effort.
sentences.cn: 全力以赴的努力。

sentences.en: [as modifier]a man of all-round ability.
sentences.cn: 一位全才。

sentences.en: [as modifier]she set a new all-comers record.
sentences.cn: 她刷新了参赛者纪录。

sentences.en: a strange woman, dressed all in black
sentences.cn: 一袭黑衣的奇怪女子

sentences.en: All colour fades— especially under the impact of direct sunlight.
sentences.cn: 所有颜色都会褪色——尤其是在阳光直射下。

sentences.en: All this, needless to say, had been culled second-hand from radio reports.
sentences.cn: 不用说，所有这些都是从电台报道中采集来的二手材料。

sentences.en: Butter, margarine, and oily fish are all good sources of vitamin D.
sentences.cn: 黄油、人造黄油和多脂鱼都含有丰富的维生素D。

sentences.en: drinks all round.
sentences.cn: 为所有人提供饮料。

sentences.en: drinks all round.
sentences.cn: 为所有人提供饮料。

sentences.en: going all out to win.
sentences.cn: 全力以赴争取胜利。

sentences.en: good acting all round.
sentences.cn: 大家都演得很好。

sentences.en: good acting all round.
sentences.cn: 大家都演得很好。

sentences.en: Hannah didn’t say a single word all the way back home (=  during the whole of the journey  ) .
sentences.cn: 回家时汉娜一路上没说一句话。

sentences.en: Have you done all your homework?
sentences.cn: 你作业都做完了吗？

sentences.en: he gets into all kinds of trouble.
sentences.cn: 他惹上各种各样的麻烦。

sentences.en: he gets into all kinds of trouble.
sentences.cn: 他惹上各种各样的麻烦。

sentences.en: He programmed his computer to compare all the possible combinations.
sentences.cn: 他给他的计算机编制了一套程序，以比较所有可能的组合。

sentences.en: He waited until all the luggage was cleared, but Paula's never appeared.
sentences.cn: 他一直等到所有的行李都拿走了，但始终没看见葆拉的。

sentences.en: I left Texas and said good riddance to all that.
sentences.cn: 我离开了得克萨斯州，总算摆脱了那里的一切。

sentences.en: I picked first all the people who usually were left till last.
sentences.cn: 我先挑出了所有通常留到最后的人。

sentences.en: I try to remember all the good times I've had here.
sentences.cn: 我试着回忆在这里度过的所有美好时光。

sentences.en: I was all for tolerance.
sentences.cn: 我非常支持宽容策略。

sentences.en: I was all for tolerance.
sentences.cn: 我非常支持宽容策略。

sentences.en: I’ve heard it all before.
sentences.cn: 我以前全都听过。

sentences.en: If people want more freedom of choice, then I’m all for it (=  I strongly support it  ) .
sentences.cn: 如果民众想要更多选择的自由，我完全支持。

sentences.en: If you wait, all that happens is that you get older.
sentences.cn: 如果你等待，发生的只有变老。

sentences.en: it was a bad day all round.
sentences.cn: 那一天事事不顺。

sentences.en: it's all over between us.
sentences.cn: 我们之间到此结束。

sentences.en: James was all over her.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯对她是全心全意。

sentences.en: On Sunday Cohen lay around the house all day.
sentences.cn: 科恩星期天一整天都在家无所事事。

sentences.en: She’d given up all hope of having a child.
sentences.cn: 她完全放弃了生孩子的希望。

sentences.en: simple cases or hard cases, it's all one to me.
sentences.cn: 简单或艰难的情况对我来说都一样。

sentences.en: Talent, hard work and sheer tenacity are all crucial to career success.
sentences.cn: 事业要成功，才能、勤奋和顽强的意志都至关重要。

sentences.en: that's our management all over!.
sentences.cn: 这才是我们彻头彻尾的管理呢！。

sentences.en: the champion took on all comers.
sentences.cn: 冠军与所有参赛者较量。

sentences.en: The happiest are not those who own all the best things, but those who can appreciate the beauty of life.
sentences.cn: 最幸福的人们并不一定什么都是最好，只是他们懂得欣赏生活的美好。

sentences.en: the restaurant that Hugh and all his friends go to
sentences.cn: 休和他所有的朋友们去的那家饭馆

sentences.en: the show lasted all of six weeks.
sentences.cn: 这展示会竟开了六周之久。

sentences.en: the show lasted all of six weeks.
sentences.cn: 这展示会竟开了六周之久。

sentences.en: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
sentences.cn: 当你从内心深处找到一种可以忍受一切痛苦的坚强力量时，你的成长历程就会出现飞跃。

sentences.en: There is built-in storage space in all bedrooms.
sentences.cn: 所有卧室里都有内置储藏空间。

sentences.en: there were bodies all over.
sentences.cn: 尸横遍野。

sentences.en: They were quarrelling all the time (=  very often or continuously  ) .
sentences.cn: 他们老是在吵架。

sentences.en: This is all I have.
sentences.cn: 这就是我的全部家当。

sentences.en: We all know that fats spoil by becoming rancid.
sentences.cn: 我们都知道油脂变质后会发臭。

sentences.en: we've been all over the place looking for you.
sentences.cn: 我们一直到处找你。

sentences.en: Well, at any rate, let me thank you for all you did.
sentences.cn: 好吧，不管怎样，还是要感谢你所做的一切。

sentences.en: You shouldn’t be sitting here by yourself, all alone.
sentences.cn: 你不应该一个人孤零零地坐在这儿。
